description.markdown: We are back to it after a much needed break & we're kicking things off with a London.js fan favourite...

organizers.name: James McLeod
organizers.role: Open Source Lead at NatWest Group

organizers.name: Jordan Potts
organizers.role: Head of Technology at Albany Growth

refreshments.description: A variety of food & drink will be served. We will endeavour to cater for allergies & dietary requirements. This won't just be pizza & beer either...

items: A desire to explore JavaScript from different points of view is absolutely recommended
Feel free to bring your JS projects along
Please RSVP to secure a place
Please ask plus 1's to sign up to the group & RSVP
Spaces are limited so techies get priority
